Constructor Detail

Game

public Game(int run,
            double[] ratios,
            java.lang.String scoringtemplate,
            boolean human,
            int humanpos)
constructs a game object by binding all the relevant information

Parameters:
run - the number in a series of run for this game
ratios - the double[] array with the algorithm ratios for the AI players
scoringtemplate - the name of the scoring template to be used
human - a flag telling the game whether or not a human player is taking part too
humanpos - if there is a human player, it will override the player in the players array at this position
Method Detail

pad

private java.lang.String pad(java.lang.String s,
                             int i)
zero-pads a string to the specified length

Parameters:
s - string to pad
i - minimum string length
Returns:
padded string of length >=i

play

public int play()
play a full game of MJ

Returns:
the number of draws during this game - used for statistical purposes, as we want to bring down this number as much as possible

setupPlayers

private void setupPlayers()
set up four players, one of which can be a human player

playHand

private int[] playHand(int handnumber,
                       int roundhand,
                       int roundnumber,
                       int redeal,
                       int windoftheround)
play a hand in this game

Parameters:
handnumber - the number of this hand
roundhand - the number used to tell each player which wind they're playing in this hand
roundnumber - the round number - each game is composed of 4 rounds, where each round is composed of at least 4 hands
redeal - the redeal number for this hand
windoftheround - the wind of the round
Returns:
an int[] with the updated values for roundhand, roundnumber and redeal
